# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY  issue575.cir issue575.cir.res.gs issue575.cir.sh issue575.cir.options issue575_small.cir issue575_small.cir.res.gs issue575_small.cir.tags tags DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/issue575.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND BASH_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/ISSUE_575/issue575.cir.sh COMMAND bash issue575.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} issue575.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/ISSUE_575/issue575.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/ISSUE_575/issue575.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;weekly;expression;table;abm;issue575;performance")
endif()
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/ISSUE_575/issue575_small.cir COMMAND $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> issue575_small.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/ISSUE_575/issue575_small.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;expression;table;abm;issue575")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/ISSUE_575/issue575_small.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP issue575_small.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/ISSUE_575/issue575_small.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} issue575_small.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/ISSUE_575/issue575_small.cir.prn issue575_small.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/ISSUE_575/issue575_small.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED issue575_small.cir)
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/ISSUE_575/issue575_small.cir.verify PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;expression;table;abm;issue575")
endif()
